definition: the gradual beginning or coming forth
details:
noun
- the gradual beginning or coming forth
= synonyms: emergence
- vegetation that has grown
= example: vegetation that has grown
- something grown or growing
= example: something grown or growing
- (biology) the process of an individual organism growing organically
= synonyms: growing
- a progression from simpler to more complex forms
= example: a progression from simpler to more complex forms
- a process of becoming larger or longer or more numerous or more important
= synonyms: increase
- (pathology) an abnormal proliferation of tissue (as in a tumor)
